modal.description_timerBasic: This is a basic form of timer.
modal.description_playFunction: The timer starts when you click the play button.
modal.description_pauseFunction: The timer pauses when you click the pause button.
modal.description_stopInPause: The timer resets when you click the stop button while paused.
modal.description_resumeAfterPause: The timer resumes when you click the play button after pausing.
modal.description_noRecordOnExit: Time is not recorded if the app is closed or the device is turned off.
